00027 typedef cDynamicExpression::Value Value; // abbreviation for local use
00028 
00029 class ModuleIndex : public cDynamicExpression::Functor
00030 {
00031   public:
00032     ModuleIndex();
00033     ModuleIndex *dup() const {return new ModuleIndex();}
00034     virtual const char *getFullName() const {return "index";}
00035     virtual const char *getArgTypes() const {return "";}
00036     virtual char getReturnType() const {return 'L';}
00037     virtual Value evaluate(cComponent *context, Value args[], int numargs);
00038     virtual std::string str(std::string args[], int numargs);
00039 };
00040 
00044 class ParameterRef : public cDynamicExpression::Functor
00045 {
00046   protected:
00047     bool ofParent;  // if true, return parentModule->par(paramName)
00048     bool explicitKeyword; // when ofParent==false: whether the NED file contained the explicit "this" qualifier
00049     std::string paramName;
00050   public:
00051     ParameterRef(const char *paramName, bool ofParent, bool explicitKeyword);
00052     ParameterRef *dup() const {return new ParameterRef(paramName.c_str(), ofParent, explicitKeyword);}
00053     virtual const char *getFullName() const {return paramName.c_str();}
00054     virtual const char *getArgTypes() const {return "";}
00055     virtual char getReturnType() const {return '*';}
00056     virtual Value evaluate(cComponent *context, Value args[], int numargs);
00057     virtual std::string str(std::string args[], int numargs);
00058 };
00059 
00063 class SiblingModuleParameterRef : public cDynamicExpression::Functor
00064 {
00065   protected:
00066     bool ofParent;  // if true, return parentModule->getSubmodule(...)->par(parname)
00067     std::string moduleName;
00068     bool withModuleIndex;
00069     std::string paramName;
00070   public:
00071     SiblingModuleParameterRef(const char *moduleName, const char *paramName, bool ofParent, bool withModuleIndex);
00072     SiblingModuleParameterRef *dup() const {return new SiblingModuleParameterRef(moduleName.c_str(), paramName.c_str(), ofParent, withModuleIndex);}
00073     virtual const char *getFullName() const {return paramName.c_str();}
00074     virtual const char *getArgTypes() const {return withModuleIndex ? "L" : "";}
00075     virtual char getReturnType() const {return '*';}
00076     virtual Value evaluate(cComponent *context, Value args[], int numargs);
00077     virtual std::string str(std::string args[], int numargs);
00078 };

00083 class LoopVar : public cDynamicExpression::Functor
00084 {
00085   private:
00086     // the loopvar stack (vars of nested loops are pushed on the stack by cNEDNetworkBuilder)
00087     static const char *varNames[32];
00088     static long vars[32];
00089     static int varCount;
00090   public:
00091     static long& pushVar(const char *varName);
00092     static void popVar();
00093     static void reset();
00094     static const char **getVarNames() {return varNames;}
00095     static int getNumVars() {return varCount;}
00096 
00097   protected:
00098     std::string varName;
00099   public:
00100     LoopVar(const char *varName) {this->varName = varName;}
00101     LoopVar *dup() const {return new LoopVar(varName.c_str());}
00102     virtual const char *getFullName() const {return varName.c_str();}
00103     virtual const char *getArgTypes() const {return "";}
00104     virtual char getReturnType() const {return 'L';}
00105     virtual Value evaluate(cComponent *context, Value args[], int numargs);
00106     virtual std::string str(std::string args[], int numargs);
00107 };

00113 class Sizeof : public cDynamicExpression::Functor
00114 {
00115   protected:
00116     bool ofParent;  // if true, return parentModule->gateSize(ident)
00117     bool explicitKeyword; // when ofParent==false: whether the NED file contained the explicit "this" qualifier
00118     std::string ident;
00119   public:
00120     Sizeof(const char *ident, bool ofParent, bool explicitKeyword);
00121     Sizeof *dup() const {return new Sizeof(ident.c_str(), ofParent, explicitKeyword);}
00122     virtual const char *getFullName() const {return ident.c_str();}
00123     virtual const char *getArgTypes() const {return "";}
00124     virtual char getReturnType() const {return 'L';}
00125     virtual Value evaluate(cComponent *context, Value args[], int numargs);
00126     virtual std::string str(std::string args[], int numargs);
00127 };
00128 
00132 class XMLDoc : public cDynamicExpression::Functor
00133 {
00134   protected:
00135     bool withXPath;  // whether 1 or 2 args
00136   public:
00137     XMLDoc(bool withXPath) {this->withXPath = withXPath;}
00138     XMLDoc *dup() const {return new XMLDoc(withXPath);}
00139     virtual const char *getFullName() const {return "xmldoc";}
00140     virtual const char *getArgTypes() const {return withXPath ? "SS" : "S";}
00141     virtual char getReturnType() const {return 'X';}
00142     virtual Value evaluate(cComponent *context, Value args[], int numargs);
00143     virtual std::string str(std::string args[], int numargs);
00144 };
